ygData.subject: Re: Executioner's Axe Info
ygData.msgSnippet: Offically listed on EQ liser the executioners axe loads on a froglock executioneer in UPPER GUK, he is said to be aroun 43rd level I belive and havs higher and
ygData.messageBody:
Offically listed on EQ'liser the executioners axe loads on a froglock
executioneer in UPPER GUK, he is said to be aroun 43rd level I belive
and havs higher and lower level stuff all around the area..

Bashlor Barb Warrior of Bertox


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Michael Wooldirdge [SMTP:mike@...]
> Sent: Thursday, May 20, 1999 5:49 PM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: [warriors_eq] Executioner's Axe Info
>
> From: "Michael Wooldirdge" <mike@...>
>
> OK your tip on Emperor Crush is all wrong first off think how easy it
> would
> be to get an extremely easy weapon, as it is the Spawn for the first
> Holy
> Paladin weapon Ghouls Bane only spawns once a week.
>
> I've heard two diffrent sources for the executioner's axe, one it's
> found in
> the Tower in Oasis which is reasonable enough considering it's guarded
> by
> spectres. I've also heard that it's found off the executioner in
> Qeynos who
> is supposably level 45. Hope that helps.
>
> Koradin the Barbarian Warrior

> > From: "Jason Coan" <COANJ@...>
> >Subject: Re: Playing a Troll Warrior
> >
> >People often think that the troll regen rate makes the the ultimate
> warrior. That may be true at first, but at later levels you get to
> the
> point where you have to have a healer of some type in your group, or
> you
> will die. And at that point the troll regen is almost pointless. If
> you
> want brute str Ogre is the way to go. Their str, sta, dex, and agil
> are
> much better than Trolls, not to mention ogres have the most points to
> distribute. You can easily get your dex and agil above 90 and still
> have
> your str and sta WELL above 100. Ogres are also smarter and wiser
> than
> Trolls, so they also make better SKs and shamans....with one
> exception....trolls regen rate works very nicely with the canabalize
> spell.
> >
> >Just my 2 cents :)
> >
> >Salr D'Taynkk
> >Dark Warrior of The Kith
> >Veeshan
> >
> ><<< "Zwanenburg, John" <ZWANENJ@...> 5/19 9:22a >>>
> >From: "Zwanenburg, John" <ZWANENJ@...>
> >
> >Eyebeebad,
> >
> >Seeing as how you are a troll (good choice) your hp are gonna go up
> faster
> >than all other races which is a bonus cause you want haveto wait
> around so
> >long, my advise to you is to kill rats, decaying skels, syoung water
> >mocasins untill level 4 or so. Then if you can find one other level 4
> or 5
> >char, go for normal froglocks or a weak froglock fisherman....oonce
> you hit
> >5 you can probably solo them as well as the occasion swamp alligator,
> once
> >on level 6 head to guk but dont go in too deep, stik the the larger
> froglock
> >tads and sentinels....good exp for you and the occasional
> woven/netted
> >armor, (which sells great to any monks or spell casters. Oh you can
> get
> >netted off the small froglock tads as well.) then once you hit 10 id
> suggest
> >making your way to the south desert of ro, find a group and kill
> dercishes
> >and orcs, at around 13-15 go for the oasis and kill crocs, caimans,
> and the
> >occasional Deepwater caiman....just watch out for the giants,
> >...........after that the rest is up to you.
> >
> >lemme know if you need any more advise...i have a troll SK so i know
> the
> >area very very well.

> >
> >To get to guk from around freeport is easy, take the tunnl to North
> Ro then
> >walk toards the huts by the ocean....simply follow the coast right up
> untill
> >you hit the oasis. Once there keep following the coast past the dock,
> right
> >up untill you see an inn to your right. walk in a straight line past
> that
> >inn....as in start at it facing the door and go behind it. watch out
> cause
> >there are tons of ginats raoming around the oasis. Once you zone into
> >southeren Ro hang a left and follow the wall all the way to the next
> >zone...innothule swamp. To get to guk follow the left hand wall and
> youll
> >eventually run into a small cave, thats guk. Depending on your level
> you
> >will wanna stay in Upper Guk, there are tons of forgs to kill of all
> >different level as well as a section full of Heart spiders, (thats my
> >suggestion ... they give great loot and the giant heart spider drops
> the
> >chitin shell sheild AC 15 10 to resit poison and weighs 4 pounds.)
> just be
> >carefull cause trains are a constant plague in this dungeon
> >
> >John Zwanenburg
> >Tips Support/Support Sipt
> >Tel: (613) 998-2745

> > From: "Zwanenburg, John" <ZWANENJ@...>
> >Subject: Re: Anyone have any hints on starting a guild
> >
> >To start a guild is a long process...
> >
> >1. get 9 people recruited into your guild
> >2. get all 9 to send an email with the guild name as the subject, and
> their
> >login names, char names in the body
> >3. send an email to verant yourself wil the same info as well as the
> guild
> >Charter.
> >4 wait for 2-4 weeks for verant to get back to you.
> >5 if they accept your guild then you will have to contact a Gm at a
> certain
> >time. then they will give you as the leader the ability to add people
> into
> >your guild.
> >
> >thats the basics.
> >John Zwanenburg
